name: list-exports-monorepo
description: Given a package name and a version number, or a path to a package.json, what specifiers does it expose?

scripts.pretest: if [ -n "${LERNA-}" ]; then npm run lint ; else LERNA=1 lerna run pretest; fi
scripts.posttest: if [ -n "${LERNA-}" ]; then aud --production ; else LERNA=1 lerna run posttest; fi

author: Jordan Harband <ljharb@gmail.com>
